English: We are a part of the huge Confederation, made up by several members.
The Belgians are now a core part of our Nation.
We have accepted the Treaty and it's consequences.
We shall negotiate an unequal treaty against the Chinese.
The Constitution is unfortunately Outdated and causing Unrest.
Our men are inspired to join the Military.
We have doubled down on Traditional Ideals and rejected all Modern Ideals.
Our Brothers and Sisters can now enjoy a Free Finnish Republic.
Our Government has rejected giving more liberties to the People.
Italy is currently divided between our Republic, the Roman State, and Naples.
A Light shines upon Venice, a City of Freedom.
